stab.name: Stab
stab.brief: A basic attack any swordsman can use.

shield.name: Shield
shield.desc: Blocks ${block} of each incoming damage for your target
shield.brief: A basic defensive skill everyone should learn to protect themselves. Although, it's rather ineffective against piercing damage

zap.name: Zap
zap.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage and applies 2 stun effects to your target
zap.brief: A simple electric spell that every magician must master to be taken seriously.

absorb.name: Absorb
absorb.brief: A more advanced defensive technique that can protect and heal you as well.

explode.name: Explode
explode.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage to your target and ${self_damage} damage to yourself
explode.brief: This volatile spell does lots of damage... to everyone. Not even the user is guaranteed safety.

heal.name: Heal
heal.brief: A simple skill magicians should learn to heal injuries.

sacrifice.name: Sacrifice
sacrifice.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage to your target and yourself. Also applies 4 curse effects to your target
sacrifice.cdesc: Applies 2 additional curse effects to your target
sacrifice.brief: A volatile spell capable of dealing massive amounts of damage to your target, but it can also harm yourself as well.

flashy fireworks.name: Flashy Fireworks
flashy fireworks.desc: Deals ${dmg} x5 damage to your target, applying 1 burn effect for each hit
flashy fireworks.brief: Happy New Year! Shoot off a burst of fireworks, dealing repeated damage to your target.

multi punches.name: Multi Punches
multi punches.desc: Deals ${dmg} x3 damage to your target.
multi punches.brief: One of the most advanced offensive moves in martial arts, dealing a quick burst of damage to your enemies.

punch.name: Punch
punch.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage to your target. Doesn't use any stamina.
punch.brief: A very basic attack... But it can still be deadly.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.desc: Deal ${dmg} damage and applies 2 burn effects to your target
fireball.brief: This hot ball of fire can be used in battle, but most magicians simply use it to cook food and keep themselves warm.

aid.name: Aid
aid.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health along with 4 recover effects.
aid.cdesc: Heal doubles, and apply 2 additional recover effects.
aid.brief: This advanced form of healing can heal even the deepest wounds.
aid._comment: but it can't heal the wounds inside your hard. (where are you dad you said you'd get milk and come back)

lightning bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning bolt.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage to your target and applies 3 stun effects.
lightning bolt.brief: A much more deadly and advanced form of the simple zap spell, able to heavily damage and stun anyone.

cocktail.name: Cocktail
cocktail.desc: Deals ${eff_app} damage to your target for every burn effect they have (max 10x).
cocktail.cdesc: Set max burn effect applicable to 15x.
cocktail.brief: This cocktail is made of highly flammable alcohol.  Some drink... while others throw.

insult.name: Insult
insult.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage to your target and applies 2 curse effects.
insult.cdesc: Double the damage, double the applied curse effects
insult.brief: Magicians sometimes insult each other to stack up curse effects on their target.

aim.name: Aim
aim.desc: Blocks ${block} damage and applies 3 bullseye effects to your target.
aim.cdesc: Double the block, apply 2 additional bullseye effects.
aim.brief: When things get messy, this will help you calm down and focus on your opponent.

execration.name: Execration
execration.desc: Deals ${eff_app} damage to your target for every curse effect they have (max x15), but then removes up to 15 curse effects from your target.
execration.cdesc: Set the max curse effect applicable to 20x.
execration.brief: This is one of the most painful spells a magician can use on an opponent. However, it requires a lot of preparation to use correctly.

hellfire.name: Hellfire
hellfire.desc: Deals ${dmg} x2 damage to your target, There's a 60% chance to apply 1 burn and 1 curse to your target for each hit, and this card will stay on your hand after being used
hellfire.brief: This spell summons fierce blue flames straight from the underworld. They seem to have odd properties... besides their ability to toast the best marshmallows ever.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.brief: The perfect counter play when you are running low on health.

bee swarm.name: Bee Swarm
bee swarm.desc: Deals ${dmg} x4 damage to your target, applying 1 poison effect for each hit.
bee swarm.brief: Summons 4 murder hornets out of thin air that excel at inflicting continuous pain to their target.

cursed clover.name: Cursed Clover
cursed clover.desc: Deals ${dmg} x2 damage, applying a burn, curse, poison, and stun effect to your target while dealing ${self_damage} damage to yourself for each hit that landed
cursed clover.brief: Who said four leaf clovers bring good luck?  This clover is filled with the anger, madness, grief, and misery of hundreds of past generations. Only the most nefarious dare to use this on their opponents.

confetti cannon.name: Confetti Cannon
confetti cannon.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage and spawns 2 temporary **[NA/1] Distraction lv: ${level}** cards into your opponent's cards
confetti cannon.brief: CHEERS! Adventure bot anniversary event exclusive card. Shoot off some confetti, distracting your opponent in the process!

tsunami wave.name: Tsunami Wave
tsunami wave.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage, removing all burn effects from all players
tsunami wave.brief: Who doesn't love a good, violent bath under the sun?

butterflies.name: Butterflies
butterflies.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage to your target and randomly spawns 1 temporary **[NA/1] Distraction lv: ${level}** into your opponent's cards. Doesn't use any stamina.
butterflies.brief: Oh look, butterflies! Their cuteness is precisely what makes them a good distraction during battles!

relic.name: Relic
relic.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health and draws 2 more cards. There's a 75% chance that this card will stay on your hand after being used.
relic.brief: An ancient relic recovered from the ruins of a sacred temple. Legends say that if a user has it for long enough, it can make their hopes and dreams come true.

fury slashes.name: Fury Slashes
fury slashes.desc: Deals ${dmg} x2 damage to your target, applying 1 berserk effect to yourself per landed hit
fury slashes.brief: An advanced fighting technique that temporarily strengthens your future attacks.

slash.name: Slash
slash.brief: A basic but reliable attack all swordsman are taught during their.

ignite.name: Ignite
ignite.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage, applying 1 burn effect to your target.
ignite.cdesc: Damage doubles, burn effects applied doubles, priority increases to 2.
ignite.brief: A basic fire spell magicians often use to start a fireplace

sting.name: Sting
sting.desc: Deals ${dmg} pierce damage and applies 2 poison effects to your target.
sting.brief: A small sting containing some poison.

snowball.name: Snowball
snowball.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage and applies 4 chill effects to your target
snowball.brief: What's more fun than throwing giant hardened snowballs at each other during battle? It might slow them down a bit too!

trample.name: Trample
trample.desc: Decrease your target's defense by ${tramp} and deals ${dmg} damage to your target.
trample.brief: A powerful attack used to punish those who try to block.

bats swarm.name: Bats Swarm
bats swarm.desc: Deal ${dmg} x3 damage to your target and applies 1 recover effect to yourself for each hit.
bats swarm.brief: A group of four devilish little bats.

spikes bomb.name: Spikes Bomb
spikes bomb.desc: Deals ${on_hand_self_damage} damage to yourself for each turn this is in your hand. Deals ${dmg} x5 damage to your target when used.
spikes bomb.brief: A reworked version of Explode which is easier to cast and deals more damage at the cost of being much more difficult to maintain.

pandemic.name: Pandemic
pandemic.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage and applies 4 poison effects to your target, also spawning 4 temporary **[NA/0] Virus lv: ${level}** into both your target's cards and your cards.
pandemic.brief: A highly contagious plague created by dark forces beyond comprehension. A precarious magic, it's nearly impossible to counter, and it affects everyone including the caster within mere seconds of its release.

ice spike.name: Ice Spike
ice spike.desc: Deals ${dmg} piercing damage and applies 3 chill effects to your target.
ice spike.brief: A long sharp lance made of hardened ice. Simply touching the tip can pierce your skin and freeze your blood.

quick shot.name: Quick Shot
quick shot.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage and applies 1 bullseye effect to yourself
quick shot.brief: A quick, cheap shot at your opponents.

skeletal slay.name: Skeletal Slay
skeletal slay.desc: Deals ${dmg} x3 damage, applying 1 curse effect per landed hit.
skeletal slay.cdesc: All damage doubles and becomes pierced.
skeletal slay.brief: Swinging this cursed spike made from the spine of an ancient dragon grants the owner unstoppable evil power.

meditate.name: Meditate
meditate.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, and you draw 2 cards when used
meditate.cdesc: Heal doubles, and draw 3 cards instead 2.
meditate.brief: Meditate... Relax your body, forget about stress, and concentrate.

ice breaker.name: Ice Breaker
ice breaker.desc: Deals ${dmg} x4 damage to your target. If your target is frozen, this attack deal 50% more damage.
ice breaker.cdesc: Damage doubles. If your target is frozen, crit increases by 100% instead 30% in addition to 50% more damage.
ice breaker.brief: An advanced spell that's been perfected over the centuries, designed to maximize its damage against frozen foes.

heavy shield.name: Heavy Shield
heavy shield.brief: An enhanced shield that can block almost anything.

reckless assault.name: Reckless Assault
reckless assault.desc: Deals ${inverse_damage} damage to yourself and applies 2 burn, 2 curse, 2 poison, 2 bullseye, and 4 berserk effects to yourself
reckless assault.cdesc: Berserk and Bullseye effects applied double.
reckless assault.brief: Whenever someone uses this reckless spell, the user either really knows what they are doing or they're just extremely stupid.

seed.name: Seed
seed.brief: A magical seed, brought from the gardens of the heaven. Who knows what it will become when it sprouts?

sprout.name: Sprout
sprout.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, and this card becomes a **[L/4] Sapling lv: ${level}**.
sprout.cdesc: Heal doubles, and this card becomes a **[L/6] Holy Tree lv: ${level}**.
sprout.brief: A symbol of hope from the heavens, still capable of growing stronger.

sapling.name: Sapling
sapling.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, and this card becomes a **[L/6] Holy Tree lv: ${level}**
sapling.cdesc: Use this card as **[L/6] Holy Tree lv: ${level}**.
sapling.brief: A gift of the gods, spreading the auras of the ancient world. However, it has not fully matured.

holy tree.name: Holy Tree
holy tree.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, and this applies 6 recover effects, removing all negative effects from your target, and goes back to being a **[L/0] Seed lv: ${level}**
holy tree.cdesc: Heal doubles, apply 12 recover effects instead 6.
holy tree.brief: An enchanted tree of healing bearing the symbol of life and prosperity. It drops a single seed upon granting its healing powers to an adventurer.

cache.name: Cache
cache.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, and this applies 9 Restore effects to your target
cache.cdesc: Heal doubles, and apply 11 Restore effects instead 9.
cache.brief: An ingenious method devised to invest energy for increased future gain.

blessed clover.name: Blessed Clover
blessed clover.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, and this also applies 1 Recover, 2 Bullseye, and 2 Restore effects to said target.
blessed clover.cdesc: Repeat the ability x2 times instead x1.
blessed clover.brief: A legendary clover blessed with legendary healing powers.

terminate.name: Terminate
terminate.brief: You approached, they screamed. You waved, they died.

crush.name: Crush
crush.desc: Deals ${crush} damage to your opponent. Immune to target's block but still can be absorbed.
crush.brief: A technique designed to counter attack the attack counters.

beatdown.name: Beatdown
beatdown.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage to your target and applies 2 Seriate effects to yourself
beatdown.cdesc: Damage doubles and apply 4 Seriate effects instead 2.
beatdown.brief: A preparation spell to initiate a frenzy killing mode. On use, the user obtains the ability to get stronger for every regular move being used. Can become very deadly.

soul drain.name: Soul Drain
soul drain.desc: You gain ${eff_app} health for every curse effect your target has (max 15), and this also removes up to 15 curse effects from your target
soul drain.cdesc: Maximum curse effects applicable increases to 25.
soul drain.brief: A reworked Execration, healing the caster based on their enemy's curses instead of dealing amplified damage.

incapacitate.name: Incapacitate
incapacitate.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage and applies 2 Feeble effects to your target
incapacitate.cdesc: Damage doubles, apply 4 Feeble effects instead 2.
incapacitate.brief: A sly attack. Commonly used by thieves, this allows them to steal things easily.

immobilize.name: Immobilize
immobilize.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage and applies 3 Feeble effects to your target
immobilize.cdesc: Damage doubles, apply 6 Feeble effects instead 3.
immobilize.brief: An improved version of Incapacitate. Mastered only by truly skilled fighters.

coup de grace.name: Coup De Grace
coup de grace.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage and applies 8 Recover effects to your target
coup de grace.brief: A death blow to end the suffering and misery of a poor soul. However, it can heal them if not used carefully.

dragonmaster.name: Dragonmaster
dragonmaster.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage and 1000 burn effects to your target and ${self_damage} damage to yourself
dragonmaster.brief: A card that can only be used by the Dragon boss.

ironfire.name: Ironfire
ironfire.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage to your target and ${self_damage} damage to yourself
ironfire.brief: A card that can be only used by the Ironfire boss.

distraction.name: Distraction
distraction.desc: Does absolutely nothing but waste your energy and stamina.
distraction.brief: A temporary card spawned in a player's cards. These cards can usually only be used once.

haunted.name: Haunted
haunted.desc: Deals ${on_hand_damage} damage and applies 1 curse effect to yourself for every turn where this is in your hand. Does nothing when used.
haunted.brief: A temporary card spawned in a player's cards. Temporary cards can usually only be used once.

virus.name: Virus
virus.desc: Spawns 1 temporary **[NA/0] Virus lv: ${level}** in your target's cards. Doesn't use any stamina.
virus.brief: A temporary card spawned in a player's cards. Temporary cards can usually only be used once.

dark resurrection.name: Dark Resurrection
dark resurrection.desc: Clears all effects from yourself and sets your max health to 75%, but heals you up to your reduced max health.
dark resurrection.brief: A temporary card that spawns in a player's cards. Temporary cards can usually only be used once.

loot.name: Loot
loot.desc: Deals ${dmg} to your target and steals some golden coins as well.
loot.brief: A quick attack used by thieves who steal golden coins from traders or adventurers in the blink of an eye.

steal.name: Steal
steal.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage to your target and steals an item from their inventory.
steal.brief: A sneak attack that can snatch a possession of the target, but the technique is quite hard to master. The life of a thief isn't easy.

smash.name: Smash
smash.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage and applies 2 stun effects to your target.
smash.brief: A tremendous blow that deals massive damage. Only the strongest warriors have enough strength to use this attack.

battle cry.name: Battle Cry
battle cry.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health and applies 3 recover and bullseye effects to said target.
battle cry.brief: Nothing can bring back the spirit of a soldier like a good ol' battle cry.

enrage.name: Enrage
enrage.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, applies 4 berserk effects, and spawns a **[M/3] Battle Cry lv: ${level}** into your target's cards.
enrage.brief: Absolute rage, incomprehensible emotion. This display of rage can allow monsters to temporarily surpass their physical limits.

paranoid.name: Paranoid
paranoid.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage and applies 3 chill effects to your target. This also spawns 1 temporary **[NA/1] Haunted lv: ${level}** into your target's cards.
paranoid.brief: People who suffer from paranoia will often hear the steps of the unseen...

demonic ritual.name: Demonic Ritual
demonic ritual.desc: Deals ${dmg} damage to both your target and yourself and randomly spawns 1 temporary **[NA/0] Dark Resurrection lv: ${level}** into your card stack.
demonic ritual.brief: One of the most evil and dangerous dark magic spells created in the world. However, because this spell is so old and almost impossible to master, even some of the most renowned adventurers don't know about the existence of this magic.

devour.name: Devour
devour.brief: A miniature blackhole-like magic absorbing all obstacles in its path.

reform.name: Reform
reform.desc: You gain ${heal} health, and your max health is reduced to 50% of what it was previously.
reform.brief: This dark magic can reform even the most severely damaged object into a new one, but of lower quality.

harden scales.name: Harden Scales
harden scales.desc: Blocks ${block} damage and draws 3 cards for your target.
harden scales.brief: A defensive ability which powerful scaled creatures use to defend themselves.

prideful flight.name: Prideful Flight
prideful flight.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health and restores 3 stamina, and apply 10 Restore effects to yourself.
prideful flight.brief: The user takes flight, casting off all ailments.

combust.name: Combust
combust.desc: Deals ${eff_app} x7 damage to your target for every burn effect your target has.
combust.brief: An immensely powerful flame-based attack used only by the Red Wyvern.

rapid burst.name: Rapid Burst
rapid burst.desc: Deals ${dmg} x7 damage with a 90% chance to apply 1 Burn effect to your target for each hit.
rapid burst.brief: Miniature fireballs rain down from above. Only Red Wyverns and dragons can use effectively.

rejuvenate.name: Rejuvenate
rejuvenate.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health, applies 5 Recover effects to yourself, and clear all negative effects from the target except Poison. This card will stay in your hand when used and costs 3 stamina.
rejuvenate.brief: An immensely powerful healing spell, usable only by incredibly powerful mages.

smite.name: Smite
smite.desc: Deals ${lich_revenge} * ( ( current hp / max hp ) ^ 50 ) damage. This card will stay in your hand when used and costs 3 stamina.
smite.brief: An attack which deals damage by draining power directly from the user's life force.

regenerate.name: Regenerate
regenerate.desc: Your target gains ${heal} health and has all negative effects except poison removed, and applies 5 Recover effects to yourself. This card costs 2 stamina.
regenerate.brief: A natural ability wielded by liches. It heals them at the cost of draining their energy.
